meanings.definition: Bring the different elements of (a complex activity or organization) into a relationship that will ensure efficiency or harmony.
meanings.sent1: We need to coordinate our schedules to meet for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The team must coordinate their efforts to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: Trying to coordinate a surprise party without anyone finding out is tricky.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit perfectly coordinates with her shoes, creating a stylish look.
meanings.sent5: The conductor's role is to coordinate the musicians to play in harmony.

meanings.definition: A number that identifies a position relative to an axis.
meanings.sent1: The map showed the coordinates of the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent2: The GPS uses coordinates to pinpoint your exact location.
meanings.sent3: The coordinates on the graph revealed the intersection point.
meanings.sent4: She followed the coordinates to find the buried time capsule.
meanings.sent5: The coordinates of the star led the astronomers to a new discovery.
